name: heaven water sparrow
description:
a game about wanting to meet your fated partner who may or may not remember you, and about making a deal with heaven. whatever deal you must make.

ーーーーー

this is a mobile game for android phones (.apk) 

if you don't have an android phone, you can play it on your computer by downloading bluestacks and emulating android. 

1. install bluestacks
2. double-click on .apk to have bluestacks install it
3. open up bluestacks (it won't automatically open up after the .apk is installed)

https://www.bluestacks.com/
